code:
%%{init: {
  'theme': 'base',
  'themeVariables': { 'fontFamily': 'Inter, Arial, sans-serif', 'fontSize': '14px' }
}}%%
mindmap
    root((AARIS Data Architecture — MongoDB))
        Database: aaris
            submissions Collection
                Document Structure
                    - _id (ObjectId)
                    - title (string)
                    - content (parsed text)
                    - file_metadata (object)
                        - original_filename
                        - file_size
                        - file_type (pdf/docx)
                        - pages
                    - status (pending/processing/completed)
                    - final_report (markdown string)
                    - created_at (datetime)
                    - completed_at (datetime)
            agent_tasks Collection
                Document Structure
                    - _id (ObjectId)
                    - submission_id (string)
                    - agent_type (methodology/literature/clarity/ethics)
                    - status (pending/running/completed/failed)
                    - critique (object)
                        - score (number 1-10)
                        - findings (array)
                        - highlights (array)
                    - created_at (datetime)
                    - completed_at (datetime)
        Indexes
            submissions
                - _id (primary)
                - status
                - created_at
            agent_tasks
                - _id (primary)
                - submission_id
                - agent_type
                - status
